name: eslint-config-floriangosse
description: ESLint rules according to floriangosse's personal preference

scripts.test: npm run lint && ! eslint --no-ignore tests/fail.fixture.js > /dev/null && eslint --no-ignore tests/pass.fixture.js && echo 'pass'
